products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Silver Grey Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their silver grey colour - a light warm grey tone that is a perfect sophisticated and sleek complement to any room.

products.title: Chateau Blockout Slate Grey Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their chateau blockout collection combines all of the sophisticated look of pleated blinds with the technology of blockout fabrics. It features their solar and thermal fabric technolgy meaning it both keeps your home warm in the winter and cool in the summer. Featured here in their slate grey colour - a tone that is perfect for sleek, modern, and sophisticated decor schemes. products.title: Lexington Grey Thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.
